item.title: Gary Weigert on WGNU. Listen
item.description: Just to let everyone know, Gary Wiegert, is back on the radio. Every Friday at 1200 noon. WGNU 920 AM or you can connect on the computer. Gary Wiegert is also a St Louis Police Officer and a devoted Tea Party Supporter. wgnu920am.com Listener Call-In Line 314-448-4325 Via Patsy
